name: Real News
description:
Real News - Make "real" news with your fellow writers and vie for the front page headline! This realtime party game requires internet access to play.

---> Go to http://resist-jam.herokuapp.com/ to play!!! <---

Programming - Anton Pantev (@AntonPantev), David Byers (@UncadeDave), Kirk Musngi (@musngikd)

Art - Ruthie Edwards (@ruthie_edwards), Tyler Rhodes (@TylerRhodesArt)
